modName: better yet still hearthfire friendly marcurio
summary: make the hirable marcurio for the bee and barb look better
descriptionHtml:
hi
the point of this mod is to make that sad run down imperial hireling look fairly descent
he is completely hearthfire compatible as far as i can tell

so far no bugs

unfortuneatley no incompatibilities have been found yet
pleasse comment if you find one

i hope you enjoy my first mod
author: Kurumu Asakura
